name: RorriM (itch) (Dylan Smit, HHSplinter, Nevaeto)
description:
RorriM is a VR horror game where you need to find your way through the Dutch Waterline nature and a special fort.

Here you will quickly find out not everything what it seems, you don't even know if you can trust your own reflection!

Text currently only is in Dutch, English coming later!

Made by 3 students from University of Arts Utrecht (HKU)!

Team:

Dylan Smit - All-round developer + technical artist

Hedda Splinter -3D game artist

Maik Smidt - 2D game artist
